    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Speaking With the Divine &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Aug 17, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/speakingdivine
     </span>
     <span class="printguideurl" style="padding:0px 10px 0px 10px;">

        Print Guide
       </a>
      </span>

        RSS Updates

        </span>
       </td>
       <td align="right" style="white-space:nowrap;">
        <span class="lgsearch">

        <form method="post" name="homesearch" style="display:inline;">

         <label for="searchs" style="display:none;">
          Search Text
         </label>
         <label for="what" style="display:none;">
          Search Type
         </label>
         <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_label" class="lgsearch_item">
             &nbsp;&nbsp;Search:&nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_field" class="lgsearch_item">
             <input type="text" class="searchField" name="searchs" id="searchs" onkeypress="return handleEnterSearch(event,'homesearch','customSearch()');" />
             &nbsp;
            </div>
           </td>
           <td valign="middle">
            <div id="lgsearch_dropdown" class="lgsearch_item">

              Search
             </button>
            </div>

    <div id="commentslistp5765038" style="display:none; margin:0px 10px;">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21752312">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21752312">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21752312">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21752312">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21752312" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21752313">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21752313">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21752313">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21752313">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or search on the article title in
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu">
            <br />
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21752313" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21752314">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21752314">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21752314">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary and secondary works published as books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21752314">
          <div id="boxatt21752314" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25236622">
              <a id="link_25236622" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236622,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Speaking With the Divine', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25236626">
              <a id="link_25236626" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236626,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Speaking With the Divine', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19973860}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Offers previews of books, with link to interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21752315">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21752315">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21752315">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Peer-reviewed journal articles as secondary sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21752315">
          <div id="boxatt21752315" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25236507">
              <a id="link_25236507" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236507,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Speaking With the Divine', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12618737}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals, and includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25236509">
              <a id="link_25236509" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236509,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Speaking With the Divine', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for religious studies. Some full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25236629">
              <a id="link_25236629" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236629,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Speaking With the Divine', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24765183}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A free resource. Use with caution, as not all resources are in fact scholarly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25236508">
              <a id="link_25236508" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25236508,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Speaking With the Divine', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343016}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Archive from Stanford University of scholarly journals in all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5765038" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21752318">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21752318">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21752318">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in an bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21752318">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For help in writing annotated bibliographies, visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           for a
           <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/01/">
            definition
           </a>
           of an annotation and
           <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            sample formatting
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21752318" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21752319">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21752319">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21752319">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21752319">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21752319" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
